alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 21 at 6:02PM EDT until August 21 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Buffalo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Jefferson County in central New York... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 601 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dexter, or 9 miles west of Watertown, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Watertown, Dexter, Glen Park, Adams Center, Sackets Harbor, Brownville, Chaumont, Depauville, La Fargeville and Perch River. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 42 and 46, and near exit 48. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
